channel.title: An Interesting Combination of Smooth Jazz and Trap
channel.description:
Could it work? Is it a horrible mistake? Gimme some feedback. Rough at some parts but it's an idea.
https://soundcloud.com/appway/gucci-mane-pillz-jazz-remix

item.title: An Interesting Combination of Smooth Jazz and Trap
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

rmark45matsu:

I enjoy smooth jazz with a passion, but this doesn’t suite to my tastes in that sense. Some others may like it, if that’s the case I wish you all the best, and nonetheless great job mixing.

Yeah I don’t know, it’s just a stupid idea that (in my eyes) doesn’t sound too bad. I was trying to take two musical genres and provide as much unlikely contrast as I could. Thanks for the feedback on my mix man

Read full topic
item.source: An Interesting Combination of Smooth Jazz and Trap
